Again after some time of normal behavior problem with ReadBlockFromDisk...

12-core CPU
128GB RAM
4TB HDD
Bitcoin Core Daemon version v0.17.99.0-5f23460c7

title: Again problem with ReadBlockFromDisk: Deserialize or I/O error - ReadCompactSize()
